Description: Name of first bus to which branch is attached.
Name of second bus to which branch is attached.
Limit of apparent power which can pass through branch.
Switch to allow capacity s_nom to be extended in OPF.
If s_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value.
If s_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by potential).
The dispatch set point for the controllable branch in PF.
Minimal dispatch (can also be negative) per unit of s_nom for the controllable branch in OPF.
Maximal dispatch (can also be negative) per unit of s_nom for the controllable branch in OPF.
Capital cost of extending s_nom by 1 MVA.
Active power at bus0 (positive if bus is withdrawing power).
Reactive power at bus0 (positive if bus is withdrawing power).
Active power at bus1 (positive if bus is withdrawing power).
Reactive power at bus1 (positive if bus is withdrawing power).
